_header: Saint Nycasie had a pock small
_description: Charm for the pox — three couplets

DULCosViii10.Transcription:
Saynte nycasye had a pocke smalland moche grevaunce had he with
                    allhe prayed to god þat hym dere boghteþat who so hym
                    enderly be soghteþat he hym from the pockes shyllde wereyef he
                    had hys name on hym wreten & bere
